content:
Sure, here are some revised statements for the team survey:

1. I always take the initiative to address problems and find solutions, even if it's outside of my job description.
2. I proactively seek feedback and take action to improve my performance, even if it means stepping outside of my comfort zone.
3. I hold myself accountable for my actions and take responsibility for my mistakes, rather than placing blame on others.
4. I actively seek out opportunities for growth and development, even if it means taking on additional work or responsibilities.
5. I consistently challenge myself and my team to exceed expectations and strive for excellence, rather than settling for mediocrity.
6. I communicate effectively and honestly with my team, even when it's difficult or uncomfortable.
7. I prioritize the success of the team over my own personal goals and interests, even if it means sacrificing in the short term.
8. I actively seek to understand and appreciate the perspectives and backgrounds of my team members, even if they differ from my own.
9. I am willing to take calculated risks and try new approaches, even if there is a chance of failure.
10. I consistently demonstrate a positive attitude and energy, even in challenging situations.

Again, the answer choices could be: Strongly Agree, Agree, Disagree, Strongly Disagree.
